1.title: Hands on a Big Mixer
1.plot: In order to win an amazing mixer, Chowder and Mung compete in a grueling contest that involves standing still./Gazpacho talks Mung and the gang into helping him transport some dangerous fruit across town.

2.title: The Spookiest House in Marzipan
2.plot:

3.title: The Poultry Geist
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: The Blast Raz
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: The Belgian Waffle Slobber-Barker
5.plot: After his lazy methods as Scout Leader are called into question, Gazpacho takes Chowder and his fellow Apprentice Scouts on the most grueling outing of their lives./When the catering company is robbed, the gang cooks up a guard dog. But Chowder modifies the recipe, making the dog turns more dangerous than not having any protection.

6.title: The Apprentice Scouts
6.plot: Gazpacho takes Chowder, Gorgonzola, Panini and Ceviche on a Scout Trip.

7.title: A Little Bit of Pizzazz!
7.plot: When the use of the magical spice pizzazz goes awry, all the gang ends up switching bodies with each other.

8.title: The Birthday Suits
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: The Heist
9.plot: The gang finds a stash of rock candy called sugar sapphires under Endive's house and try to raid the loot before she discovers./Endive feels guilty after playing a trick on Mung.

10.title: The Prank
10.plot: Endive decides to prank Mung Daal but things go awry when Mung turns up dead.

11.title: Old Man Thyme
11.plot: When Chowder sees the terrible effects of old age on Mung and Truffles, Chowder tries to find a way to stop Old Man Thyme from making him old and ugly./When Chowder's newspaper fails to sell, Chowder makes a new cover title known as the MIP (Most Important Person).

12.title: Chowder's Magazine
12.plot: When Chowder's attempts to sell his magazine "The Fork and Spoon Weekly" fail, he decides to run a cover story on the MIP, the Most Important Person in the kitchen. Mung, Truffles and Shnitzel each try to prove to Chowder why they are the MIP.

13.title: Weekend at Shnitzel's
13.plot: Shnitzel has to watch Chowder over at his house while Mung and Truffles are out of town. When Chowder says his life is too boring and drags him to a parody of Chuck E. Cheese, Shnitzel falls in love with an Animatronic, "Seniorita Mesquite"./Mung accidentally ruins his tongue which make makes him unable to taste things. So he asked Chowder to be his "taste buds".

14.title: Taste Buds
14.plot: After getting his taste buds pulled off, Mung asks Chowder to be his "Taste Buds".

15.title: Gazpacho!
15.plot: A ninja-hating friend of Gazpacho's tries to help Gazpacho find his mother./Chowder accidentally eat a tootin' fruit and becomes a musical sensation, but his life is taken over by his agent, Gorgonzola, and soon he misses Mung and has to go back with him.

16.title: The Toots
16.plot: After Chowder eats a tootin' fruit that sounds as a classical opera, Gorgonzola makes him popular.

17.title: Chowder Grows Up
17.plot: Mung tells Chowder that one day he'll have to grow up and run the kitchen on his own once he becomes old enough. Chowder didn't want to grow up and sings a song explaining why, but he sings the same song for twenty years and grows up naturally. He then sees what all of his friends grew up to be, and he finally realizes that he should stop acting like a kid and grow up.

1.title: The Froggy Apple Crumple Thumpkin/Chowder's Girlfriend
1.plot: If Chowder can survive making a very complicated dish, he's on his way to becoming a chef. But the last step may be the one that finally breaks him./When Panini sets her love-struck eyes on Chowder, he tries every trick he can think of to convince her he's not her boyfriend.

2.title: Burple Nurples/Shnitzel Makes a Deposit
2.plot: Mung Daal must stop Chowder from selling a dish with rat poison in it. Elsewhere, Schnitzel has trouble making a deposit at the bank.

3.title: Grubble Gum/The Cinnamini Monster
3.plot: Chowder makes the big mistake of not sharing his gum with Truffles, and soon all of Marzipan City ends up in a huge wad of gum.

4.title: The Sing Beans/Certifrycation Class
4.plot: The Sing Beans: In order to cook the performing food Sing Beans, the gang has to stay up all night as the dish cooks. But Chowder takes it upon himself to finish the process with wildly musical results. Certifrycation Class: When Mung is forced to spend a day in Chef Certifrycation school, he butts heads with the instructor. Mung must decide to stay true to his instincts or swallow his pride in order to pass.

5.title: The Wrong Address/The Wrong Customer
5.plot: The Wrong Address: Chowder leads Mung through an unfamiliar part of Marzipan City. The Wrong Customer: An outlaw uses the catering company as a hideout.

6.title: Mahjongg Night/Stinky Love
6.plot: Chowder learns that messing with Truffles' game night means certain doom. But he's willing to risk it all for a taste of the Mevilled Eggs she's serving./Kimchi falls in love with one of Mung's smelliest dishes, whisking it away to a romantic setting atop the catering company. Chowder goes against Mung's wishes and stands up for his pet's right to happiness.

7.title: The Thrice Cream Man/The Flibber-Flabber Diet
7.plot: Mung Daal creates a man from the Thrice Cream dessert to satisfy Chowder. Elsewhere, Truffles goes on a diet and forces everyone else to share it.

8.title: Gazpacho Stands Up/A Taste of Marzipan
8.plot: Chowder helps Gazpacho prepare for his comedy debut; Mung and Ms. Endive unveil the same dish at Marzipan City's biggest food fair.

9.title: The Puckerberry Overlords/The Elemelons
9.plot: When a powerfully sour berry sends Chowder on a strange journey into his own mouth, he finds himself on a mission to save his beloved taste buds from some very tart invaders./When Truffles' short temper causes Mung's fruit creatures to stop producing juice, he locks her in the garden with an ultimatum: Either she makes friends with them or she never gets out.

10.title: Sniffleball/Mung on the Rocks
10.plot: Mung Daal sends Chowder outside to learn sports, which Chowder finds unbearable. Elsewhere, Truffles ignores Mung after he forgets their wedding anniversary.

11.title: The Heavy Sleeper/The Moldy Touch
11.plot: Chowder finds a devious mold which tricks him into an alliance. Elsewhere, Mung Daal is accidentally drugged to sleep and no one can wake him up.

12.title: At Your Service/Chowder and Mr. Fugu
12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: The Vacation/The Sleep Eater
13.plot: Chowder, Mung and Shnitzel just want to spend a nice day at the beach. But when they all get trapped in the bathroom, it becomes a race to escape before Chowder explodes from having to go number one./When Chowder knocks his internal clock out of whack, he becomes an unstoppable Sleep Eater! Now in order to return himself to normal, he must stay up all night without eating - a task that is easier said than done for the hungriest kid in Marzipan City.

14.title: The Bruised Bluenana/Shnitzel and the Lead Farfel
14.plot: Panini tricks Chowder into caring for a wounded fruit... as her husband. Elsewhere, Schnitzel has lost his strength and must regain in a tournament.

15.title: The Thousand Pound Cake/The Rat Sandwich
15.plot: Chowder and Schnitzel deliver a cake to a client who lives in a giant's scalp. Elsewhere, a rat is discovered in Mung's kitchen and the gang gets blackmailed.

16.title: Chowder Loses His Hat/Brain Grub
16.plot: Chowder loses his hat and sets off on a quest to recover it. Elsewhere, Mung Daal cooks up a meal to make Chowder smarter.

17.title: Shnitzel Quits
17.plot: Shnitzel quits Mung's Catering Company for good and goes to work for their rival, Endive. But he soon discovers that his old friends mean more to him than he realized.

18.title: The Broken Part/The Meach Harvest
18.plot: Chowder is sent to find a spare part for a machine he broke. Elsewhere, Mung Daal has to deal with a traumatic experience in his early years.

19.title: Banned from the Stand/Creme Puff Hands
19.plot: After an argument with Mung leaves him drunk with power, Gazpacho must choose between being right or winning back his friends./Chowder becomes unusually useful after his hand accidentally becomes inflated. But when that usefulness starts turning dangerous, Mung is forced to take matters into his own inflated hand.

20.title: The Apprentice Games
20.plot: When Chowder and Gorgonzola are unwillingly paired up at the annual Apprentice Games competition, they discover their opposing personalities lead to a winning formula.

1.title: The Arborians
1.plot: A forest of annoying trees take over Mung Daal's house.

2.title: Panini for President/Chowder's Babysitter
2.plot: Panini for President - When Panini declares herself president of the apprentice's society, Gorgonzola (through Chowder) competes against her. Chowder's Babysitter - While babysitting Chowder, Gazpacho thinks he has killed Chowder and needs to get his "spirit" to pass on to the other side.

3.title: The Fire Breather/The Flying Flinger Lingons
3.plot: Chowder gains the catastrophic ability to breathe fire. Elsewhere, a circus comes to town, setting the stage for chaos.

4.title: The Garage Sale
4.plot: Mung gets Chowder to find a storybook to read to an impatient Meat Oaf (a live, talking meatloaf made for a customer). Unfortunately Chowder couldn't find a book in time due to all the clutter in the kitchen. Mung and Truffles decides to have a garage sale in order to lighten the load and make some money along the way. Chowder, not knowing what a garage sale is, plays along with it, until he sees Mung selling Gazpacho his forks. Not wanting people to buy "his" junk, Chowder tries to get people out of buying them, including telling one customer that buying a box of old...

5.title: Hey Hey It's Knishmas
5.plot: Chowder worries he won't receive the gift he wants on Knishmas. Meanwhile, Mung wants to make a perfect Schmingerbread house, but he may have to buy one from Mrs. Endive instead.

6.title: Chowder's Catering Company/The Catch Phrase
6.plot: Chowder opens a catering company, but tries to literally kill off the competition (meaning Mung). Elsewhere, Mung tries to acquire a catchphrase to enhance his cooking.

7.title: The Hot Date/The Shopping Spree
7.plot: Sgt Hoagie tries to finish a case fast so he can go to a date. Elsewhere, the gang spends all Truffles's money without her knowing, and must move fast to get it back.

8.title: The Party Cruise/Won-Ton Bombs
8.plot: When Mung takes Chowder and Shnitzel on a fishing cruise, he gets more than he bargained for thanks to captain Rueben./Mung's old cooking master shows up and embarrasses him, telling everyone about his greatest cooking failure. Now the only way to prove he's become a good chef is to travel back in time with Chowder to fix his mistake.

9.title: Won Ton Bombs
9.plot: Mung Daal and Chowder travel back in time to avert a humiliating cooking disaster Mung made in his younger years.

10.title: The Big Hat Biddies/The Deadly Maze
10.plot: Big Hat Biddies: It's Truffles big day to impress the members of The Big Hat Biddies, Marzipan City's most exclusive ladies' club. But Chowder, Mung, and Shnitzel's best efforts may hurt her chances more than help. The Deadly Maze:As part of an elaborate revenge scheme, Mung's old apprentice, Gumbo, traps Chowder in a deadly maze!

11.title: The B.L.T.'s/The Trouble with Truffles
11.plot: Chowder takes an examination to ensure he remains an apprentice. Elsewhere, Truffles tries a new voice because no one likes her old voice.

12.title: The Dinner Theater
12.plot: Mung and the gang decide to host a "whodunit" dinner theatre night, but when Chowder gets confused into thinking that Gazpacho's villain character is actually going to kill someone, he springs into action to solve the case before it is too late.

13.title: Kid Shnitzel
13.plot: Shnitzel reverts back to being a kid so he can get out of doing work. When Chowder joins him in the diversion, it's only a matter of time before one of them must grow up./When an unruly customer hassles Gazpacho, he and Chowder try to find a way to stand up to her.

14.title: Gazpacho Fights Back
14.plot: Kid Shnitzel: Shnitzel reverts back to being a kid so he can get out of doing work.

15.title: Big Ball
15.plot: Mung Daal and his wife face off as rivals in a bizarre game.

16.title: The Brain Freeze
16.plot: Chowder suffers a brain freeze and gets trapped within his own dream world.

17.title: The Snail Car
17.plot: Mung tries to replace the family snail car

18.title: The Lollistops
18.plot: Chowder destroys his teeth in order to get to the dentist and eat delicious lollistops.

19.title: Endive's Dirty Secret/Big Food
19.plot: Mung blackmails Endive to use her pool.

20.title: Paint the Town/The Blackout
20.plot: Chowder draws a world of his own.

21.title: The Dice Cycle/The Chain Recipe
21.plot: Chowder wrecks Mung's bike & blames Ceviche / Mung ignores a chain recipe, causing bad luck.

22.title: The Garden/Sheboodles!
22.plot: Chowder becomes Truffles's apprentice in gardening, causing him to neglect Mung Daal. Elsewhere, Miss Endive cooks up the perfect man, but it goes wrong.

23.title: Gazpacho Moves In
23.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

24.title: My Big Fat Stinky Wedding
24.plot: Gazpacho moves in & annoys everyone...so they clone him... / Chowder wants to save Kimchi from an arranged marriage

25.title: Apprentice Appreciation Day
25.plot: Mung and Endive compete to show how much they appreciate Chowder and Panini / Chowder gets a symbiotic downer friend

26.title: The Grape Worm
26.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

27.title: A Faire to Remember
27.plot: When a new girl befriends Chowder, Panini goes crazy with jealousy./Chowder discovers that Shnitzel had a previous life as a samurai bodyguard.

28.title: Tofu Town Showdown
28.plot: Chowder discovers Schnitzel has had a previous life as a samurai bodyguard.

imdb.title: Chowder
plot: In Marzipan City, the young, excitable food-loving _Chowder_ (qv) is the apprentice of Mung Daal, a very old chef who runs a catering company with his wife, Truffles and assistant, Shnitzel.::Hailey-7
